n=this;this.dragged=!1;var r=this.options;return e(".ui-unselecting",this.element[0]).each(function(){var r=e.data(this,"selectable-item");r.$element.removeClass("ui-unselecting"),r.unselecting=!1,r.startselected=!1,n._trigger("unselected",t,{unselected:r.element})}),e(".ui-selecting",this.element[0]).each(function(){var
